name: Label That Diagram - Human Heart - PreMed
name_original: Label That Diagram - Human Heart - PreMed
description:
This Windows program allows a person to study the structure of the human heart. There are three diagrams to be labelled. Each is on a separate screen. Finally, there is a multiple choice test that presents 25 questions in a random order. The user may view a Report Screen after completing one or more screens. The diagrams contain parts of the heart not normally covered in a basic biology course.

Programs distributed by rtcgames do not connect to the internet at all. There is no registration and no collection of any kind of data. Programs from rtcgames will run on Windows versions 7 through 11.  It will also run in most Linux distros with PlayOnLinux or Wine. The files being distributed are scanned with Bit Defender, Malware Bytes, and Iolo Shield. However, Google displays a warning when downloading the files because they are zipped executable files.
To install: download the zipped setup file, extract the file, and then run it. Enjoy.

This file may be downloaded and distributed freely. However, it is not to be sold or distributed for profit.
